name: cold-brewology
description: The science and art of making delicious cold brew coffee

scripts.bs: export NODE_ENV=production; export LIVE=false; webpack --env=prod --config webpack.server.config.js
scripts.bc: export NODE_ENV=production; export LIVE=false; webpack --env=prod --config webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bc && npm run bs
scripts.open:dist: export NODE_ENV=production; export LIVE=false; export PORT=3001; nodemon index.js
scripts.build:open: npm run build && npm run open:dist
scripts.mocha:unit: mocha --watch --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=test/runner,reportFilename=runner,quiet=true,reportPageTitle='MyProject: Unit Test',reportTitle='MyProject: Unit Test' --require test/setup.js $(find src test -name '*.test.js' -not -path 'test/integration/*' -not -path 'node_modules/*'  -not -path 'src/_news/*')
scripts.mocha:integration: mocha --watch --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=test/integration/runner,reportFilename=runner,quiet=true,reportPageTitle='MyProject: Integration Test',reportTitle='MyProject: Integration Test' --require test/setup.js test/integration/**/*.test.js

author: Pat Jacobs
